heading: Today
text: Periods of morning clouds, breaking for increasing sunshine in the St. Lawrence Valley and NY, and some breaks from VT east this afternoon, last northeast. Blustery and cool. Highs from the upper 40s to upper 50s north to south. Northwest winds becoming north 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming mostly clear, except clouds lingering northeast. Lows in the 30s, some upper 20s over the higher terrain north. North winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 15 to 25 mph

heading: Thursday
text: Periods of clouds through the northern Green and White Mountains. Mostly sunny most elsewhere west and south. Continued blustery and chilly. Highs in the upper 40s to mid 50s north to south. North winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph
